mapper.select: SELECT tc.*, tg.name AS tag_name, m.id AS member_id, m.nick_name AS member_nick_name, m.real_name AS member_real_name, m.avatar AS member_avatar, m.sex AS member_sex FROM t_task_circle tc JOIN member m ON tc.creator_id = m.id JOIN r_task_circle_tag rg ON tc.id = rg.circle_id JOIN t_task_tag tg ON rg.tag_id=tg.id WHERE tc.id = #{circleId}

SELECT tc.*, tg.name AS tag_name FROM t_task_circle tc JOIN t_task_circle_member m ON tc.id = m.circle_id JOIN r_task_circle_tag rg ON tc.id = rg.circle_id JOIN t_task_tag tg ON rg.tag_id=tg.id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId} AND tc.deleted = 0 ORDER BY m.create_time DESC LIMIT #{page.offset},#{page.limit}

select count(1) FROM t_task_circle tc WHERE tc.deleted = 0
AND (tc.id=#{keyword} OR tc.name LIKE concat('%', #{keyword} ,'%'))
SELECT count(1) FROM t_task_circle tc JOIN t_task_circle_member m ON tc.id = m.circle_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId} AND tc.deleted = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE t_task_circle c SET c.member_count = c.member_count + #{inc} where c.id = #{circleId}
